languages.text: Jae can use either {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} for Intelligence-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, whichever is higher. Additionally, Jae can re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} (+1 attempt for each test).
languages.original_text: Применяя {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыки{/g}, зависящие от {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g}, Джай может использовать {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g}, если значение этой характеристики выше. При провале {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Коммерции{/g} Джай может выполнять проверку повторно (+1 попытка для каждой проверки).

traits.locale_text: Jae can use either Fellowship or Intelligence for Intelligence-based skills, whichever is higher. Additionally, Jae can reroll failed Commerce tests (+1 attempt for each test).

Jae can use either {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} for Intelligence-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, whichever is higher. Additionally, Jae can reroll failed {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} (+1 attempt for each test).

Jae can use either {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} for Intelligence-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, whichever is higher. Additionally, Jae can reroll failed {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} (+1 attempt for each test).

Additionally, Jae can re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} (+1 attempt for each test).

При провале {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Коммерции{/g} Джай может выполнять проверку повторно (+1 попытка для каждой проверки).
languages.original_text: Jae can use either {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} for Intelligence-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, whichever is higher. Additionally, Jae can re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} (+1 attempt for each test).

traits.locale_text: Применяя навыки, зависящие от Интеллекта, Джай может использовать Общительность, если значение этой характеристики выше. При провале проверки Коммерции Джай может выполнять проверку повторно (+1 попытка для каждой проверки).

Применяя навыки, зависящие от Интеллекта, Джай может использовать Общительность, если значение этой характеристики выше. При провале проверки Коммерции Джай может выполнять проверку повторно (+1 попытка для каждой проверки).

languages.text: 当婕伊需要进行基于智力的{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}检定时，婕伊可以使用{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}属性进行检定，以数值较高者为准。此外，当婕伊的{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商业{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}失败时，可以重新进行检定（每个商业检定多一次尝试机会）。
languages.original_text: Jae can use either {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} for Intelligence-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, whichever is higher. Additionally, Jae can re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} (+1 attempt for each test).

traits.locale_text: 当婕伊需要进行基于智力的{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}检定时，婕伊可以使用{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}属性进行检定，以数值较高者为准。此外，当婕伊的{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商业{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}失败时，可以重新进行检定（每个商业检定多一次尝试机会）。

languages.text: ジェイは {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}のいずれか数値が高い方を知性ベースの{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}に使用できる。さらに、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商取引{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した場合リロール可能（判定ごとに1回）
languages.original_text: Jae can use either {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} for Intelligence-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, whichever is higher. Additionally, Jae can re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} (+1 attempt for each test).

traits.locale_text: ジェイは {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}のいずれか数値が高い方を知性ベースの{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}に使用できる。さらに、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商取引{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した場合リロール可能（判定ごとに1回）

languages.text: Jae puede usar tanto {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} como {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} para {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} basadas en la Inteligencia, dependiendo de qué valor sea más alto. Jae también puede volver a tirar {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Comercio{/g} fallidas (+1 intento por cada prueba).
languages.original_text: Jae can use either {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} for Intelligence-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, whichever is higher. Additionally, Jae can re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} (+1 attempt for each test).

traits.locale_text: Jae puede usar tanto {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} como {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} para {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} basadas en la Inteligencia, dependiendo de qué valor sea más alto. Jae también puede volver a tirar {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Comercio{/g} fallidas (+1 intento por cada prueba).

languages.text: Jae kann entweder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} als auf Intelligenz basierende {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} nehmen, je nachdem, welcher Wert höher ist. Darüber hinaus kann Jae gescheiterte {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Handel{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} erneut würfeln (+1 Versuch für jede Probe).
languages.original_text: Jae can use either {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} for Intelligence-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, whichever is higher. Additionally, Jae can re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} (+1 attempt for each test).

traits.locale_text: Jae kann entweder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} als auf Intelligenz basierende {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} nehmen, je nachdem, welcher Wert höher ist. Darüber hinaus kann Jae gescheiterte {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Handel{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} erneut würfeln (+1 Versuch für jede Probe).

languages.text: Pour les {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} basées sur l'intelligence, Jae peut utiliser sa caractéristique {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, selon la valeur la plus élevée. De plus, Jae peut retenter les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} manqués en lançant à nouveau les dés (+1 tentative pour chaque test).
languages.original_text: Jae can use either {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} for Intelligence-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, whichever is higher. Additionally, Jae can re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} (+1 attempt for each test).

traits.locale_text: Pour les {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} basées sur l'intelligence, Jae peut utiliser sa caractéristique {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, selon la valeur la plus élevée. De plus, Jae peut retenter les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} manqués en lançant à nouveau les dés (+1 tentative pour chaque test).

languages.text: Jae, Zekâ tabanlı {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}yetenekler{/g} için {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} niteliklerinden hangisi yüksekse onu kullanabilir. Ek olarak Jae, başarısız {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Tecim{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testine{/g} tekrar girebilir (Her bir test için +1 teşebbüs).
languages.original_text: Jae can use either {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} for Intelligence-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, whichever is higher. Additionally, Jae can re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} (+1 attempt for each test).
